mapper.select: select id as id, user_login_name as loginName, user_real_name as realName, user_nick_name as nickName, user_pwd as pwd, user_college as college, user_major as major, user_entrance_school_time as entranceSchool, user_phone as phone, user_mail as mail, user_qq as qq, user_weixin as weixin, user_department as department, user_register_time as registerTime from sau_cwnu_member_info where user_login_name=#{loginName}
